text: muhî€¼mmad keval ek rasool hain, isase pahale bahut-se rasool ho chuke hain, to kya yadi vo mar gaye athava maar diye gaye, to tum apanee ediyon ke bal[1] phir jaoge? tatha jo apanee ediyon ke bal phir jaayega, vo allaah ko kuchh haani nahin pahuncha sakega aur allaah sheeghr hee krtagyon ko pratiphal pradaan karega
